title: Australia fires: Graffiti artists' tribute to firefighters
description: The artists also raised money to help wildlife impacted by the worst wildfires in decades.

title: Taal volcano: Lava spews as 'hazardous eruption' feared
description: Authorities have warned that a "hazardous eruption" could take place "within hours or days".

title: Yusaku Maezawa: Japanese billionaire seeks 'life partner' for Moon voyage
description: Yusaku Maezawa appeals for a "life partner" to join him on Space X's maiden Moon voyage in 2023.

title: Harry and Meghan: Royals gather for talks over Sussexes' future
description: The Queen is holding talks at Sandringham later to try to find a way forward for Prince Harry and Meghan.

title: Harry and Meghan: What's on the agenda for the royal talks?
description: A meeting of senior royals is deciding next steps on issues such as finance, duties and security.

title: Harry and Meghan: The royal couple are looking for the exit
description: As senior royals gather in Sandringham, our royal correspondent wonders what the talks will achieve.

title: Retired Pope Benedict warns Francis against relaxing priestly celibacy rules
description: The surprise appeal comes as Pope Francis considers an easing of the rule banning married priests.

title: UK Somalis 'racially profiled' over FGM
description: Parents are wrongly being arrested due to the stigma around female genital mutilation, campaigners say.

title: Child car seats: Why is it so hard to recycle them?
description: Children under 12 must use a car seat, but many parents struggle to dispose of them responsibly afterwards.

title: Oscar nominations: 6 things to look out for
description: A female director, a repeat of #OscarsSoWhite or a good year for British talent?

title: The disabled teenagers whose identity crisis led them to modelling careers
description: Models Brinston and Caitlin turned to fashion to boost their confidence after becoming wheelchair-users, then gained international careers.

title: Hired by Weinstein to spy on celebrities
description: The spy posed as a journalist to extract information from Hollywood stars for Weinstein.

title: 'I want an egg donor with my heritage'
description: When IVF failed, Natasha was sad to learn that there are few egg donors of Afro-Caribbean heritage.

title: Hevrin Khalaf: Death of a peacemaker
description: Syrian-Kurdish leader Hevrin Khalaf was executed by a Turkish-backed rebel group, BBC Arabic reports.

title: The billionaire retailer whose shops had no stock
description: Luiza Trajano, owner of Brazilian shop chain Magazine Luiza, is one of the country's richest people.
